effect.@en: By spending a Fortune Point, you can make an improvised ranged attack against a single foe within 1+[PB]. They suffer 1D10+[BB] Damage from acid. However, Acidic Spittle ignores a foe's Damage Threshold Modifier from armor, but a foe can attempt to Dodge Acidic Spittle or Parry it with a shield. Acidic Spittle can be used while Engaged with enemies.
